premise_source_doc_sentence: Benjamin Geza Affleck-Boldt  (  born August 15 , 1972  )  is an American actor and filmmaker .

premise_source_doc_sentence: He began his career as a child and starred in the PBS educational series The Voyage of the Mimi  (  1984 , 1988  )  .

claim: Ben Affleck began his campaign as a child.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He later appeared in the independent coming-of-age comedy Dazed and Confused  (  1993  )  and various Kevin Smith films including Chasing Amy  (  1997  )  and Dogma  (  1999  )  .

claim: Ben Affleck began his campaign as a child.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Affleck gained wider recognition when he and childhood friend Matt Damon won the Golden Globe and Academy Award for Best Original Screenplay for Good Will Hunting  (  1997  )  .

claim: Ben Affleck began his campaign as a child.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He then established himself as a leading man in studio films including the disaster drama Armageddon  (  1998  )  , the romantic comedy Forces of Nature  (  1999  )  , the war drama Pearl Harbor  (  2001  )  and the thriller Changing Lanes  (  2002  )  .

claim: Ben Affleck began his campaign as a child.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After a career downturn , during which he appeared in Daredevil and Gigli  (  both 2003  )  , Affleck received a Golden Globe nomination for his performance in the noir biopic Hollywoodland  (  2006  )  .

premise_source_doc_sentence: His directorial debut , Gone Baby Gone  (  2007  )  , which he also co-wrote , was well received .

premise_source_doc_sentence: He then directed , co-wrote , and starred in the crime drama The Town  (  2010  )  .

claim: Ben Affleck began his campaign as a child.
premise_source_doc_sentence: For the political thriller Argo  (  2012  )  , which he directed and starred in , Affleck won the Golden Globe and BAFTA Award for Best Director , and the Golden Globe , BAFTA , and Academy Award for Best Picture .
